title: Unable to connect to login queue - stuck in authetication-
body:
After trying the the options in the support page 3 times each, I am still unable to login to queue. I have tried to reinstall 5 times, used the hextech repair tool and all of its options, checked my firewall and I am still unable to login in. My account name and password are correct. Please help. I just want to play league :^) 

The last time I logged in was yesterday at 11PM central time.

replies.body: I too am having issue can't get past authentication this happened after the game updated earlier today
Which internet provider do you have? I have the same issue
i have the same problem, but i am using frontier. Not sure is casue by internet or patch .

Couldn't login on Frontier.

Used phone's 4G internet, it worked.

Confirmed Frontier related issue.
On frontier as well and having this issue. Great...{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

> [{quoted}](name=PrincePikachu,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=euw6E68u,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-05-11T05:58:57.199+0000)
>
> Which internet provider do you have? I have the same issue

I'm not OP, but I have Frontier. Do you have that? Another poster mentioned it might be a Frontier issue.

Thanks for the heads up guys, RiotRival mentioned in another post that this should be resolved now.  It looks like a few ISPs had some issues overnight, which caused some players to fail reaching the authentication server to login.  All should be okay now!
This is still a problem on European servers.
Same problem I was in game que and It didn't want to quit and was never able to log back in
Stuck in authentication.... Can someone/something solve the problem ?
great seems like we all have same issue... frontier +1... has been reinstall this game for 5 times and still same issue... all start with ramdon DC and everything F up...... hope it works tmr
I have the same problem, after patch I'm not sure what is causing this. I stuck at Authenticating
Me too since yesterday morning. I can't login even on this site with my main account. I even went on different computers and I still can't login it just keeps sayin unable to login que
